## LookAtParams.zoomLevel property

Zoomlevel of the MapView.  Takes precedence over distance.  5 in \[\[MapView.constructor\]\] context.  \[\[MapView.zoomLevel\]\] in \[\[MapView.lookAt\]\] context.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
zoomLevel: number;
```
